Text: Pure brilliance, thnx a lot man!!! Probably u guys r the only ones that know what movies we want cos its one classic after the other, lovin ur rips bro. A/V: 10/10 +1 infinity times pls dont be bothered by -1's that u get its probably yify fans who cant stand ur awesome uploads. A few requests if i may (i noticed that u havent uploaded these before or hav very low seeders and hence): The Godfather, back to the future and Pixar's Up
